Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Helmet
Description: Very well preserved back section of a helmet, which bears very few traces of oxidisation. The exterior surface is convex. The upper section is folded up over 15 mm and has three hinges to which other sections must have been attached. Holes that must have been used as a fastening system are found at regular intervals along the edge. There also is a ring on the exterior surface.
